com.google.gwt.gwtai.trayicon.client
Interface TrayIconApplet

All Superinterfaces:
Applet
All Known Implementing Classes:
TrayIconAppletImpl
public interface TrayIconApplet
extends Applet

The applet methods that shall be available from GWT are defined in this interface. There are also a couple of annotations used to configure how the applet is embedded within the page (the applet's dimension and other stuff). Note; don't call the add methods to soon. Make sure the applet is initialized first.

Author:
Adrian Buerki
